comments: Can't run in single fragment mode if the query contains a table which has hard distribution requirement.

* Visitor to scan the RelNode tree and find if it contains any Scans that require hard distribution requirements.
* Can the given relTree be executed in single fragment mode? For now this returns false when the * relTree contains one or more scans with hard affinity requirements. * * @param relTree * @return
